Text: Thank youDear Mary Thank you for taking the time to meet with me regarding the Tax analyst position within Enron I greatly appreciate the time you took to review my resume and discuss the kinds of opportunities I can pursue Your information will be most helpful After meeting you and learning more about this program I remain very interested in pursuing work opportunities within Enron I feel that the combination of previous work experiences and school projects all position me well to be successful in this position I welcome the opportunity to demonstrate my skills within Enron Also I am very excited about the chance to work with such a great team This position is exactly what I have been looking for and I sincerely hope I am the person you are looking for as well Again I appreciate the time you spent with me and I look forward to speaking with you again in the near future Please feel free to contact me at or if I can provide you with any additional information All Best Wishes ShuI Sammi Hung Renwick Dr Houston TX
